column1: settled  law  that  the  Arbitrators  under  the  Industrial  Dispute  Act  exercise  arbitral
powers  and  not  judicial  powers.  I  wish  to  reproduce  the  observation  made  by
Bandaranayake, J. in The State Bank Of India v. Edirisinghe and Others, [1987]1 SLR
395 at P.399, which was confirmed by a majority decision of the Supreme Court in
State Bank of India v. Edirisinghe and Others reported in [1991]1 SLR 397.
